description: A thin nylon panel with hook-and-loop surface for attaching to outfits for identification.  This one is 3″×11″ in size.  On dark gray background, in bold white lettering, it says "FEMA".
A thin nylon panel with hook-and-loop surface for attaching to outfits for identification.  This one is 3″×11″ in size.  On dark gray background, in bold white lettering, it says "POLICE".
A thin nylon panel with hook-and-loop surface for attaching to outfits for identification.  This one is 3″×11″ in size.  On black background, in bold white lettering, it says "U.S. NATIONAL GUARD".
A thin nylon panel with hook-and-loop surface for attaching to outfits for identification.  This one is 3″×11″ in size.  On dark blue background, in yellow light-reflective lettering, it says "EMS".

A thin nylon panel with hook-and-loop surface for attaching to outfits for identification.  This one is 3″×11″ in size.  On desert brown background, in yellow light-reflective lettering, it says "FIRE".
